channel.title: Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.1.0-beta.1)
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.1.0-beta.1)

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Changelog # このプロジェクトの重要な変更点は以下のとおりです。 Keep a Changelogをベースにした形式で表記されています。 1.1.0-beta.1 - 2023-07-07 # Added # Now we can choose texture format for Merge Toon Lit Material #251 This includes one tiny BREAKING CHANGES. Previously MergeToonLit uses ARGB32 as texture format but for now, it use ASTC 6x6 or DXT5 by default based on platform. Changed # Move Components into Avatar Optimizer folder #247 Previously they are Optimizer folder Completely rewrite apply on play system #249 This replaces way to awake modular-avatar by bdunderscore.
